definition: Holy Son/Jesus Christ/God the Son (in the Christian Trinity)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: There the three wise men present gifts to the Christ child.
sentences.chinese: 在那里，三位智者为基督圣子呈上礼物。

sentences.english: Because Paul preached that Jesus is the Son of God he was in danger.
sentences.chinese: 保罗因到处宣传耶稣就是圣子而身处危境。

sentences.english: The name Jesus is the human name of the incarnates Son of God.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣的名字，是道成肉身圣子的人类名字。

sentences.english: The Son of God shares his chosenness with us.
sentences.chinese: 天主圣子同我们分享了祂的蒙选。

sentences.english: How do you accept the son?
Seiko Fujioka was born in Matsuyama, Ehime Prefecture, Japan in 1982.
sentences.chinese: 藤冈圣子，1982年生于日本爱媛县松山市。

sentences.english: Gone back in time to bless the child.
Remember that midgets are Holy unto Me; thou shalt not overlook them.
sentences.chinese: 记住小矮人们是我的圣子，不要忽视他们。

sentences.english: God had but one Son, and he was sent into the world to be a mission doctor.
sentences.chinese: 上帝只有一个圣子，他被派到人间做了一名传教医生。

sentences.english: Lord Jesus Christ, Son of God, have mercy upon us sinners.
sentences.chinese: 求上帝圣子主伊伊稣斯合利斯托斯可怜有罪的人。

sentences.english: Will San siro once again echo with the chants of “per vedere segnare kaka” ?
sentences.chinese: 那么圣西罗能再次迎回他们的圣子卡卡吗？

definition: Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
feudal term of praise for ruler, king or emperor/general term for saint in former times/term for God during the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom 太平天國|太平天国/Holy Spirit (in Christian Trinity)
God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
